item.title: An Introduction to Sentiment Analysis of Textual Data
item.description:
Description

In this tutorial, youâ€™ll be introduced to Sentiment Analysis (SA), the extraction of subjective, affective information from text through Natural Language Processing (NLP) to enable data-driven decisions. Participants will work through a step-by-step application of SA to build a sound knowledge of its different components and an understanding of this powerful technique in various business settings
item.dc:creator: Fatma Tarlaci
